@graph.name: Using the Sync Button in OptizenAI
@graph.description: Learn how to sync new tags and collections to the OptizenAI app using the sync button feature. This tutorial covers both Collections and Tags sync buttons and explains the syncing process.

about.name: OptizenAI Sync Functionality
about.description: Database synchronization feature for tags and collections

@graph.transcript: In this tutorial, we'll show you how to use the sync button in OptizenAI. There are two sync buttons - one under Collections and one under Tags. Click either button to sync new collections and tags to your app. The process may take a few minutes depending on your store size.

@graph.headline: Using the Sync Button
@graph.description: Complete guide on using the sync button feature in OptizenAI to synchronize new tags and collections to your app database.
teaches: How to locate sync buttons in OptizenAI
When to use the sync functionality
Accessing newly synced tags and collections

@graph.name: How to Sync Tags and Collections in OptizenAI
@graph.description: Step-by-step instructions for syncing new tags and collections to the OptizenAI app using the sync button feature.

step.name: Locate the Sync Button
step.text: Navigate to either the Collections tab or Tags tab in your OptizenAI dashboard. You'll find a 'Sync' button in each section.

step.name: Click the Sync Button
step.text: Click on either sync button (Collections or Tags) to initiate the synchronization process. Both buttons serve the same purpose and will sync all new collections and tags.

step.name: Wait for Sync Completion
step.text: The sync process will begin and may take a few minutes depending on the size of your store. Wait for the process to complete before proceeding.

step.name: Access Synced Content
step.text: Once the sync is complete, you'll be able to search for and edit your newly synced tags and collections using the search function.

@graph.name: OptizenAI Sync Button Tutorial
@graph.description: Interactive learning resource for mastering the sync functionality in OptizenAI

about.name: Database Synchronization
about.description: Process of updating local app data with server-side changes

mainEntity.name: When should I use the sync button?

acceptedAnswer.text: Use the sync button when you can't find new tags or collections in the search function. This typically happens when new items have been added to your store but haven't been synchronized to the OptizenAI app yet.

mainEntity.name: How long does the sync process take?

acceptedAnswer.text: The sync process duration depends on the size of your store. It typically takes a few minutes, but larger stores with more tags and collections may require additional time.

mainEntity.name: Is there a difference between the Collections and Tags sync buttons?

acceptedAnswer.text: No, both sync buttons serve the same purpose. Clicking either the Collections sync button or the Tags sync button will synchronize both new collections and tags to your app.

mainEntity.name: What happens if the sync fails?

acceptedAnswer.text: If the sync process fails, try refreshing the page and clicking the sync button again. If problems persist, check your internet connection or contact support for assistance.
